name: @smashsend/node
description: SmashSend Node.js SDK - Official Node.js client for SmashSend API

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:esm: tsc --module es2020 --outDir dist/esm && npm run bundle
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release-beta: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release
scripts.release:beta-patch: npm version prepatch --preid=beta && npm run release-beta
scripts.release:beta-minor: npm version preminor --preid=beta && npm run release-beta
scripts.release:beta-major: npm version premajor --preid=beta && npm run release-beta

author: SmashSend
